name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sleeps, Zefiel, stanshall, NotGodot, NYU, Moraiat, chatterjee, regrepsnefpoh, cashprizes, Afkpuz, FinnS, alejandroadam, usversusthem, dropkickpikachu)

name: deimosrising
text: Onstad has mastered the use of the ellipsis; case in point, this alt text.

name: werthog42
text: A comment left by werthog42 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by luckypyjamas, GoriasXY, gbeaton, M-E-Charm, slalvation, Darthemed)

name: johnnyrocker
text: people who post the alt text get lamed. deimo is playing it safe.

name: wilbur
text: It is a perfect... alt text!

name: kardlonoc
text: Man they wouldn't get caught.

name: mrmacky
text: I've had that hangover! Still walk with a cane.

name: blueloggy
text: Just reading this is giving me flashbacks to my worst hangovers ever. Ones that are change-your-ways bad.

name: themacktruck
text: When you've gone to sleep in a college shower just so you don't have to move to vomit... that is a bad hangover.  I will never try to match that man drink for drink again.

name: feetnotes
text: God, this whole story arc is so finely crafted. I can't even believe how good it is.

name: invidious
text: The best part is how Beef still hasn't bothered to take off the Lincoln beard.

name: deancain29
text: the big one. been there.

name: turnabout
text: An early appearance of the Hangover Ham?

name: steerpike66
text: Oh I've had that one. Shaking, tears, hiding behind furniture being pointed at by ghosts.

name: mbain3001
text: This is perfect, and describes this morning pretty well.

name: greenkoolayd
text: are you being pointed at, or is the furniture?

name: decentbee
text: This was basically me for most of today.

name: wae
text: the sheet's feelings have been HURT

name: honesttom
text: Just about every part of this strip has worked its way into my day-to-day vocabulary. I have never seen the full horror of a hangover so precisely depicted. When I'm hungover I read this strip and laugh very gently.

name: shoinan
text: And speaking as honesttom's housemate, this is quite often. Ray is suffering from the Mel Gibson of hangovers clearly.

name: molesticide
text:
wheelchairs and stuff, speakin at high schools...

we had so many of those guys. SO many.

name: conmansj
text: Back in high school, we had the same guy come in to speak about both drunk driving AND absolutely terrible hangovers. It was a really sobering experience.

name: johnnyc
text: Through his speaking engagements, Ray helped thousands of young students .

name: madnes
text: Chubbied for quality punnage.

name: bigtom
text: we have all been there before

name: drago25
text: Ray shoulda skipped a few days for that one; s' what I do.

name: jhunter
text:
If you haven't experienced the Big Hangover consider yourself goddamn lucky.
I spent a whole day weeping helplessly on my bed punctuated by periodic vomiting into my sock drawer
Never did smell the same

name: mikeronomicon
text: I love that Beef is so hung over that he doesn't seem to realize that he still has the lincoln beard on.
